author: Hikari06
description: Transfer games downloaded from WIIU U USB Helper
details:
WIIU USB Helper Transfer Tool is a mod of both FTPIIU everywhere and WUP Installer.
  It enables you to receive games downloaded with WII U USB Helper and install them  right away.
  The FTPIIU server has been improved and allows for better transfer speed.
  Make sure to enable IOSUHAX!
  Note : If you want to have a nice background while using the app, download and extract the 
  following archive to the root of your sd card :
  http://application.wiiuusbhelper.com/transfer/background.rar
title: WIIU USB Helper Transfer Tool
